title: jojoapi
resume: The 'jojoapi' is a comprehensive solution providing detailed information about the 'stands' characters from JoJo's Bizarre Adventures manga. Developed with JavaScript (Node.js), TypeScript, Express, and utilizing a MySQL database for storage, this application is a fusion of efficiency and robustness. With a strong foundation in HTTP requests, jojoapi offers a fast and reliable query experience for fans, ensuring smooth interaction and accurate data about the fascinating characters of the JoJo universe.

title: JoJo List
resume: Web application that consumes JoJoApi and displays all 'stands' from JoJo's Bizarre Adventure manga, built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

title: analog clock
resume: Analog clock with hour, minute, and second hands, using circle geometry and angles, created using HTML, CSS, and JS with Object-Oriented Programming paradigm.

title: calculator Js
resume: Web calculator application using HTML, CSS, JS, and code obfuscation. Utilizes mathematical logic for calculations such as addition, subtraction, division, multiplication, exponentiation, square root, and approximation of pi.

title: scrapApi
resume: API that performs data extraction (web scraping) from the 'Pensador' quotes website. The functionality allows choosing a specific theme during the request, returning a JSON containing all quotes associated with the selected theme. Developed with TypeScript and Puppeteer, this application provides an efficient way to obtain inspiring and relevant content according to user preferences.

title: sophy-bot
resume: The 'sophy-bot' is an advanced WhatsApp chatbot designed to simplify group management. Expertly developed in TypeScript, this multifunctional bot not only manages groups but also offers features such as downloading and sending music and videos from YouTube directly through WhatsApp. Additionally, the 'sophy-bot' can create custom stickers, add and remove members, and even remove unwanted ads, providing an enhanced experience in the WhatsApp environment.
